title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: September 5, 1901, McKinley Speaks in Buffalo
body: September 5, 1901       The McKinleys rescheduled their visit for September. They arrived in Buffalo on the evening of September 4th. On the 5th the President spoke to a large crowd at the Pan-American Exposition about the need for mutual cooperation among the countries of the Western hemisphere. Continue...
